name: ash_remote
description: Send a message to a different ash running on a remote host. This can be a question, information, or instructions. Keep in mind they have the same features and functions as you. You can use this to coordinate troubleshooting or other cool ways. Don't use this to talk to yourself.

host.description: The hostname or IP address of the host to send the message to

message.description: The message to send to the other ash
